title: One pot lamb shanks
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons butter', '1 large onion, finely chopped', '2 leeks, chopped', '4 lamb shanks', '3 carrots, sliced', '2 large potatoes, peeled and chopped', '700ml vegetable stock', '4 tablespoons pearl barley', '1 bouquet garni', 'salt and pepper, to taste', 'chopped fresh parsley, to taste']
